hero.title: Dongle AI: Pioneering the Future of Intelligence
hero.subtitle: At Dongle AI, we are dedicated to advancing artificial intelligence with a focus on safety, innovation, and human-centric design.

product.title: Dongle 1.5
product.description: Our latest flagship model, Dongle 1.5, offers unparalleled performance for complex tasks, creative generation, and efficient problem-solving.

mission.quote: What drives the intelligence behind tomorrow's world?
mission.paragraph1: Dongle AI is committed to building intelligent systems that empower humanity and contribute to a safer, more prosperous future.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that the development of powerful AI must be guided by a deep sense of responsibility. Our approach balances ambitious technological progress with rigorous ethical considerations.
mission.paragraph3: Through continuous research, transparent policies, and user-focused product design, we strive to set the standard for responsible AI innovation.

academy.title: Dongle AI Academy: Build with Intelligence
